title: Gorgeous Luxury 1 bed/1 Bath Apartment!
posting_body: ['Gorgeous luxury 1 bed/1 bath with huge rooftop in Flatbush!', 'NO FEE!!', 'Unit features:', 'Central AC/Heat', 'Genuine hardwood floors throughout', 'Large bedroom with windows and closets', 'Beautiful kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher!', 'Huge windows bringing in lots of natural light', 'Modern tiled bathroom with deep soaking tub', '*photos are of a similar unit in the building.', 'Building has a gym, laundry and a grand rooftop!', 'B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park.', 'Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore.', 'Brooklyn Greenery, MIdwood Flats, Irv’s, Bluebird, Blessings, and Food Sermon are just a couple of the many options to check out in this vibrant neighborhood.', 'Easy commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn’s hottest neighborhoods.', 'NO FEE!!', 'Good credit and income required', 'Guarantors welcome!', 'Contact Levi for further information or to schedule a showing!']
